name: ev-arb-tool
description: EV-Arb-Tool is a Python-based project that identifies and processes positive EV bets across multiple sportsbooks and DFS (Daily Fantasy Sports) platforms. The tool calculates fair probabilities, expected values (EV), and applies platform-specific bet placement logic (e.g., grouping bets into parlays when needed). All placed bets are logged for tracking and performance analysis.
